sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit, EventEmitter} from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; import { ContactService } from '../contact.service'; // import { ContactItem } from '../contact'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-list', templateUrl: './contact-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-list.component.css'], }) export class ContactListComponent implements OnInit { contacts: Contact[]; constructor(private contactService: ContactService) { } ngOnInit() { this.contacts = this.contactService.getContacts(); } onSelected(contact: Contact) { this.contactService.contactSelectedEvent.emit(contact); console.log(contact); // this.contactService.contactSelectedEvent.emit(contact); } }
